results.title: Metformin Attenuates Silica-Induced Pulmonary Fibrosis by Activating Autophagy via the AMPK-mTOR Signaling Pathway
results.text_hl: A recent study found that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can effectively reverse @CHEMICAL_Bleomycin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001761 @@@bleomycin@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Fibrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011658 @@@pulmonary fibrosis@@@, suggesting that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has effects on @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Fibrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011658 @@@idiopathic pulmonary interstitial fibrosis@@@.

results.title: Inhaled Lipid Nanoparticles Alleviate Established Pulmonary Fibrosis.
results.text_hl: Herein, inhalable liposomes encapsulating @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, a first-line antidiabetic drug that has been reported to effectively reverse @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Fibrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011658 @@@pulmonary fibrosis@@@ by modulating multiple metabolic pathways, and @CHEMICAL_nintedanib @CHEMICAL_MESH:C530716 @@@nintedanib@@@, a well-known antifibrotic drug that has been widely used in the clinic, are developed for @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Fibrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011658 @@@pulmonary fibrosis@@@ treatment.

citations.NLM: Li D, Zhao A, Zhu J, Wang C, Shen J, Zheng Z, Pan F, Liu Z, Chen Q, Yang Y. Inhaled Lipid Nanoparticles Alleviate Established Pulmonary Fibrosis. Small. 2023 Apr 14;():e2300545. PMID: 37058092

results.title: Metformin attenuates coal dust nanoparticle-induced pulmonary fibrosis by modulating inflammation and epithelial-mesenchymal transition.
results.text_hl: Here, we explored the antifibrotic effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@) in CD-nanoparticle (CD-NP)-induced @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Fibrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011658 @@@PF@@@, focusing on its preventive and therapeutic potential.
